key_risks: Regulatory risks due to stringent environmental regulations
Supply chain vulnerabilities from reliance on third-party suppliers
Technological challenges in scaling hydrometallurgical processes
Market competition from new entrants and established players
Financial performance concerns due to lack of profitability
controversies: Pause in Rochester Hub facility construction raising financial stability concerns
Potential community impact from operational delays
environmental_issues: Subject to stringent environmental regulations impacting operations
social_issues: Community impact concerns due to paused Rochester Hub facility
governance_issues: Financial restructuring efforts and reliance on external funding

sources.snippet: Li-Cycle Holdings Corp. is a Canada-based global lithium-ion battery resource recovery company. The Company is focused on recovering critical battery-grade materials to create a domestic closed-loop battery supply chain for a clean energy future. The Company leverages its sustainable and patent-protected Spoke & Hub Technologies to recycle all different types of lithium-ion batteries.
